analysis.Summary: Vue Single File Component that displays a numeric rating and renders up to five star icons, adjusting their opacity based on the rating value. It also shows the total number of reviews.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable UI block for displaying an average rating (1–5) alongside the count of reviews within the organizations module.

Components.name: Rating
Components.responsibility: Render a section containing the rating number, star graphics and review count.

Components.name: SVG Star Icon
Components.responsibility: Visual representation of a single star; CSS class toggles opacity when the index exceeds the rating.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and type-check incoming props: rating (Number, required) and amount (Number, required).

Dependencies.note: ref and watch imported but not used in current implementation.

analysis.Usage: Imported into parent components or pages via `import Rating from 'modules/organizations/components/blocks/Rating.vue'`, then used as <Rating :rating="value" :amount="count"/>.
Notes: No style block present; styling is applied via utility CSS classes (e.g., flex, mn-r-small).
The component pre-imports `ref` and `watch` but does not currently utilize them—these imports could be removed or extended later.
Star icons are generated with `v-for` over a hardcoded range of 1 to 5.
